description.title: Hello, I'm Max!
description.message: I do iOS development for work and for fun.

applications.title: Mapstr
applications.subtitle: Save & share your best places
applications.comment: Mapstr lets you keep track of all your favorite places around the world, tag them, and find them on your very own map! I worked at Mapstr as Lead then CTO from 2016 to 2018.

applications.title: Discogs
applications.subtitle: Catalog, Collect & Shop Music
applications.comment: I was Lead Engineer Mobile at Discogs. Discogs is the world's foremost Database, Marketplace, and Community for music.

applications.title: LYL Radio
applications.subtitle: Independent & Non-profit webradio
applications.comment: I maintain LYL radio website, apps, and infra.
